emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of members of Girl Friends Inc., Marion Bond Jordon, Hazel Garland, Mrs. Woody Harris, and Adah Lavelle, posed in Press Club for annual Christmas party
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 23, 1961, pg. A11 reads: "Girl Friends Committee - When the Pittsburgh Chapter of Girl Friends Inc., entertained its husbands at its annual Christmas party, last Sunday at the Press Club, the above group was in charge. Seated, left to right are Mmes. William Goode, McKinley King, Chester E. Harris (new president), Percy A. Garland (retiring president) and Oscar Harris.  Standing, same order: Mmes, Homer S. Brown, Reginald Dixon, James Henry, Bruce Jackson, (Salem, Ohio), Robert Lavelle, James A. Jordon (chairman) Woody Harris and Wendell Stanton. - Harris Photo"
